subject: Order not confirmed
description_text:
Hello, I recently purchased a shifter from you guys for my boyfriend. I understand it’s on pre-sale so I won’t be receiving a “shipping” email until the 15th. That’s fine! My issue is, I never received a payment confirmation email, but the money was withdrawn from my account. So could I get a “payment” confirmation email please! To this same email! 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Michelle Nava,     Hello, please provide your order date and the order amount, and I will help you check the status. Normally, as long as the payment is successful, we will arrange shipment in order, so please don’t worry.
Hi Michelle Nava,    The order confirmation has been sent to the email address you provided. Do you need to change your email address? luvfries00@gmail.com

awesome yes that’s the email! Pardon me I just saw the message. 
This was the purchase and name
Sent from my iPhone

>

hello, still no receipt or notification on it being shipped or whatever!
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Michelle Nava,    We apologize for the delay. All items will be shipped out this week.

is it possible to get my tracking or order confirmation? I tried putting it through shop but I don’t see the information there. Or will I receive something when it’s shipped out? 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Michelle Nava,    Okay, we've updated your order confirmation and shipping notification.
